title: 2017 Hayatabad suicide bombing
infobox: {{Infobox civilian attack | title = 2017 Hayatabad suicide bombing | partof = the [[War in North-West Pakistan]] and [[Operation Ghazi]] | image = | image_size = | alt = | caption = | map = {{Location map|Pakistan|lat_deg=34.01|lon_deg=71.35|label=Peshawar|border=none|float=center|}} | map_size = | map_alt = | map_caption = Peshawar is in red color | location = [[Hayatabad]], [[Peshawar]], [[Pakistan]] | target = Judges | coordinates = | date = | time = | timezone = | type = [[Suicide attack]] | fatalities = 2 (+ 1 attacker) | injuries = 12{{Cite web |url=https://tribune.com.pk/story/1327747/two-killed-peshawar-blast/ |title=One killed in suicide attack on Peshawar judges |last=Firdous |first=Iftikhar}}At least one person was killed and seven people were injured on Wednesday in an explosion in Peshawar’s Hayatabad area. | victims = | perpetrators = [[Tehrik-i-Taliban Pakistan]] | assailants = | susperps = | weapons = | numparts = | dfens = | motive = | inquiry = | coroner = | accused = | convicted = | verdict = | convictions = | charges = | litigation = | website = | module = }}
article:
On February 15, 2017, a suicide bomber targeted a government van carrying civil judges in Hayatabad. The attack was claimed by Tehrik-i-Taliban Pakistan.
